author: godless
title: Comment on PHOTOS: ISIS Beheads ‘Sorcerer’ Near Damascus, Syria by godless
text: PHOTOS: ISIS Beheads ‘Sorcerer’ Near Damascus, Syria Published Updated 10:17 am EST, December 26, 2016 25 Comments By S.J. Prince 80.9k Share Tweet Follow In a new photo report purportedly released by the Islamic State, ISIS religious police, called "hisbah," behead an alleged wizard in accordance with sharia law. The photo report was released on ISIS terrorist channels on December 26. An accompanying summary of the photo report reads: "Implementation of the law of Allah in the presence of Muslims." Viewer discretion is advised. Heavy is an independent news organization. We report acts of terror and violence so that the public may be fully informed. This may include content considered graphic, which is identified. We do not support, in any way, the individuals or organizations involved. Next Image: warning-graphic-content S.J. Prince lives in New York City and is a senior contributor to Heavy. In his free time he enjoys travel and yoga. December 26, 2016 10:17 am
